text: nobandi jathinge sanwidhanaya
oba oonama welawaka obata awashya eya bhawitha kala haka, oba thahanam kirimata awadanama nisa nowa, api hitiye naha oba nirdesha.
ema abhiyoga obata pamanak no wa: me rajayata da, ratatada abhiyoga bawa palamuwen ma sandahan kala yuthu ya.
hamsa bin ladan siya mawa samaga iranaya thula wasara gananawak wasaya kala bawatath, ohuge wiwahaya ehidi siduwu bawatath wishwasa kere.
namuth, saralawa jiwathwimata nawina samajayen…
bohowita gabada idiwenne gowi bim aashrithawayi.
habayi ee awashyayenma pothpath wala neweyi.
ese liyapadinchi kirimedi warshayakata rupiyal 36,000ka mudalak aya kara athath bahuthara yanthra pramanayak kriyathmaka nowana bawa ee mahatha pawasiya.
wipakshaye mayi raliye
ehema sathiyak withara tuna ekka kalaya gathakaraddi mata nirayasayenma danuna ohu itha suwisheshiyi kiyana karanaya.
ostreliyanu pile mulma puhunu thundina tharagaya me 18wanida pi.
onna dan nam para mathaka thiyagaththa aayemath enna
itha thiyunu ha purna soyabalimakin pasuwa ethuma ewakata parlimenthuwata, karmantha sanwardhana, widya ha thakshana amathi lesa jangama durakathanaya pilibada kiya atha.
me anna aakaraye wirathwaya sihikaramin me pradeshaya “annaruwa” namin prakata wenawa.
lokema eeken wadak gannawa kiyala
mun aාftar nelume karapu dewal wala hatiyata giye koheda kiyalawath mathaka thiyeda balanna epayi.
me wirith walata niyamitha mathra gananak thiyenawa .
wenada wagema hith ganna widiyata liyala thissa.
“wataraka wijitha himiyan ada ude mayiyanganayata yanna, kolambaa bas nawathumpalata pamini awasthawedi unwahanse paharagena gos paharadila mahamanga damagos thibuna.
nithignyayanta kramawath puhunuwak laba dima mehi mulika aramuna we.
namuth agamathiwarayata thama mithrayawa guwanin nathiwa bimin gena ya haki nam ohuta apa rate siduwana nawa sanwardhana ha prajathanthrika kriyawaliye arumaya siyasinma daka gatha haki wanu atha.
oba sathuwa mehi sandahan no wana godwin samararathna mahathage patigatha karana lada dharmadeshana athnam karunakara ee mel magin apa wetha danwanna.

nawa kunatuwata hasuwima, gilima aadiya siduwu aakaraya anathuren diwi beragath ayage prakasha asurin wartha wi thibena athara, nawen gena giya wasthu sambharaye watinakama nisa ema thorathuru nisi lesa aaraksha kara thibini.
mama kisima dawasaka eeta wirodhaya pa mage thanathuru raka ganimata giyeth naha.
janadhipathiwaraya ghathanaya kirime kumanthranayak pawathina bawata saka mathu wimath samaga maladiwayin janarajaye hadisi nithiya prakashayata path kara thibe.
nishpadana inwentari pariksha karanna.
china waidya siddhanthayata anuwa, sama kanakatama shariraye wiwidha kotas samanga sambandha wi athi katu chikithsaka sthana 120 kata wada atha.
imitiyas sangawi sitina sthanaya pilibanda siyalu wisthara polis wishesha karya balakaya wetha ee wanawita labi thibini.
kalin lipiyen pata karapu malu gana kiwwa mathakayi ne.
onna hamuduruwo mala panala inna gaman prashnayak ahuwa.
akkara 1140 k.
mama giya kurunagala thiyena nishshanka maha widyalayata...
umbaa samanalayek wela anagathaya yahapath widiyata wenas karanna hithagena thatu gahana widiya hari lassanayi sahodaraya..!
ee ohege mahathma kamata salakala...
man dakinnath kalin nowa..
udaharanayak lesa mayi 14 wani da lipiya balanna.
pansala kittuwa inne...“

manawa himikam surakshitha kirimedi ayithin raka ganima menma manawa ayithin ullanghanaya wimedi handanangima itha wadagath yayi shri lanka katholika radaguru mandalaye sabhapathi aacharya winsan pranandu radaguru himipanan wahanse pawasuha.
buruwa pathaleta paninna athi.ooke thawa thawa warshan thiyanawa maye hithe...
ee pilibanda wimasilimath wannayi, kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa dhiwara saha nawika prajawata danum deyi.
wage prashna godak aawa.
mata hathata nagittama hondatoma athi.
ma dasa math kala
mata rajinawa andata ganta oona.
rosi oo donalge mulikathwaya gaththeya.
ada kapat, konkrit nathi parak rate naha.

wicharaka,yanu wicharayak nathi keneki.ohuta yudha aathathiya nam manasika asamathulitha thawaya thibe.witin wita ee thathwaya mathuwe.sarage blogaye ohu wisin damu komentuwaka sandahan karanne ohu wisin riyaduran siya ganakata kammul paharadi athi bawayi.meya sabawak nam wicharaka nithara katha karana hamuda winaya,sadacharaya sabawinma ohu thula nathi bawa neda?.
ee wagemayi kathawa.
enam, barapathala aparadha chodanawanta lakwa sitina kisiweku mathiwaranayata idiripath wimen walakwana lesayi.
2005 wasaredi indiya kandayama loka kusalana kantha krikat tharagawaliye awasan tharagaya kara ragena aawe age nayakathwaya yatathedi ya.
api jiwath wena oona thanak, oona kenek diha baluwama me antha deka anduraganna puluwan.
ape deshapalakayan gambauru kala kruthi sewanaye yedenne itha aduweni.
kaluthara pa්radeshayata labi athi thawakalika wisanduma wanne minisun athara kolahala pawa athiwana aakarayata aka්ramawathlesa paniya jala tanki adala kalaya thula thabima pamani.

umbaata aathal ganna deyak kiyannam indiyawe hindu aagame aya dipawali samaranna wesak kudu hadanawaee kiyanne wesak kuduwa hindu aagame deyakhindu aagama kiyatanne demalage budalayak (wishnu deyiyo thagia oppuwakin eeka chelwanayagamta liyala dila)ee' kiyanne wesak kuduwa ayithi demalata(landakawe demalu dipawali walata wesak kudu hadanne nathknath mokada kiyana ekata mathayak hadaganna bari wuna umbaata puluwannam e'්katath hethuwak hadagena athe gahapan)

kumana paramartha mul karagena me kriyawa sidu kalath apage rata nawatha jathyantharaya idiriyedi hallu nowiya yuthuyi.

kaluthara dediyawala prathamika waidya sathkara eekakayata mulgal thabima da saukhya amathyawaraya athin sidu kerini. 2019 wasara thula prathamika waidya sathkara eekaka 60 k da, 2020 wasara thula ewani eekaka 150 k da diwayina pura sthapitha kirimata niyamithaya.
kidni dekama narak wuna.

shri lankawa saha indiyawa athara pawathwena thewani test tharagaya labana 2 wanida nagpurhidi aarambha wimata niyamitha athara paudgalika hethuwak matha dewani test tharagayata sahabhagi nowu aarambhaka pithikaru shikar dhawan thewani test tharagayedi nawathath kandayamata ekwimata niyamithaya.
bas gamana hamara karala ape wahanayen gaman karanna thiranaya kara hawas waruwa.
ee wagemayi minisun wagema rakiya sthana wala parisaraya gana awabodhayak labannath udawwak wena deyak.
ada men nowa 70 dashakaya yanu merata natyakaruwan athishaya karyabahula awadhiyaki.
ohuta rediyowa athulata yamata hakiyawak thibini nam ohu nawathinne eya athule bawa me desa bala wun apata sithini.
kiyala film eka bagenama balanna kiyanawa.
pasukalinawa me aaryya kiyana wachanaya brahmana, kshathiya, waishyya yana usas yayi nam karana lada kula wala aya hadinwimata yodagena thibenawa.
oya samage wadath oheamama thamayi....
(obape) sawanatada, balmatada ayithikaruwa kawaparakda?
agosthu 21 wanida – aakasa kusum – prasanna withanage
bahara kala yuthu deth thiyenawa..
man inneth umbae tharkema thama.
krida panathata kala nawa sanshodhanayan da meki...
anna ee tika thamayi api ape nayaka mahinda mathithumata kiyanna thiyenne.
kale ekama deyaki enam ayadum patha karyalaye lachchuwe thibi soya ganimayi.
ee wenuwen wishesha sangitha rathriyak edina sawasa sha madiriyedi pawathwenu atha.
widiyowa haraha janapa්riyathwayak himikaragaththu..
oyita hondayi idikirim katayuthu karana thanaka simenthi anala dila rupiyal 2000ka dawas padiyak aran pawulata kanna dunna nam.

pahuwada ude suwami sankristhiyan kamareta gihilla balapuwama sanjuse unnansege suruwame kakulwala mudu wali thawarila thiyenawa dakala thiyenawa”, pamunugama ardhadwipayema ithihasa thorathuru danna jo sangapalaaarachchi pawasanne aatha kalayaka sita pamunugama wasiyan asa purudu haskamak pilibandawaya.pasugiya sunami wyasana awasthawedi pamunugama awata weralasanna gamwalata kisidu anathurak sidu nowuye shantha jusethumage aarakshawa nisa bawa pamunugama awata boho katholikayinge wishwasayaya.
ma keherali kithikawana
eheyin gaththeya yana kriyapadaya ethanata nogalape.
ada jawipe wruththiya samithiwalin wishala pirisak iwath wemin sitinawa.
eewage ma fesbuk hi wishala janathawak sitiyath, api dainika wa eya bhawitha kalath, eyin api danne kihipa deneku pamani.
oba dumpanaya karannek nam adhika mathpan panayehi niratha wenne nam wahama eewayin aathwima wadagathya.
yuddhaye di bhishanaya mudahala bawa da aththa ya.
me giye awurudu wisi gananakata passe.
therapimakadi widuliya nipadawiya haki kuda widuli jananayak nipadawimata owun samathwa thibenawa.
widde the walata…wadune asbastos walata…!

ee hethuwen aya nithara nithara, rupawahini saha janamadhya osse muhuna penwana janapriya charithayak bawata path wuwaya. 2014 mathiwaranayedi age janapriyathawada upayogi kara ganimin modi balayata gena eemata aya wishala meheyumaka yedunaya.
sapasadadhayata patha mrudakanga palabanda itha ේhanda udaharana apa sathawa atha.
ee wagema badumkara komisama path kala wagema janapathita erehiwa pahugiya kale mathuwunu yam yam chodana ganath hoyanna kiyana karanaya ohu mathu kala.
namuth meyin kiyanne mahacharya rohanadhirayange paryeshana shasthriya nowu bawa nowe.
pasudina ithama samakami wiya.
oonama gonekuta aayudhayak athata gatha haka.
gal kulunaka ek ek kotasa 1888 lesa hadinwe.
muhune anawashya roma iwath karana aalepanayak
uthure demala deshapalanagnyayo ehe minissunta sinhalayo sathuran hatiyatayi pennuwe.
balanna, meka mata thoraganimak nemeyi.
mawpiya dedena athara da daruwan athara da matha gatum ha andadabarawalin aduwakda natha.
ithin para umbaa apa liyana de nokiwwata kamak naha.

ostreliyawata paminena sankramanikayin mita pera oostreliyanu samajayata anugatha wu aakarayata dan eya sidu nowana bawath, ee hethuwen ostreliyanu purawasibhawaya labadimedi ingrisi bhasha parikshanayak hadunwadima...

ohu ma da rajya nowana sanwidhana hada gaththe ya. 1990 ganan mula di mahinda rajapaksha saha mangala samarawira ekwa nayakathwaya dun maw peramuna da wiwidha aadhara laba gath rajya nowana sanwidhanayaki.

janadhipathi dhurayen iwath kerunu simitha widhayaka balathala kihipayak nawathi aththe agamathi dhurayehi ya.

kisima wanchawakata ho dushanayakata thaman sambandha nathi bawin thamage nama 'yahapalana top ten - horu' layisthuwata athulath nokarannayi illamin aanduwe prabala amathiwarayeku parlimenthu manthri mahindananda aluthgamage mahathata medinawala digin digatama durakanatha amathum labadena bawa deshapalana aaranchimarga walin warthawe.

kawuru hari hithanawa nam thaman me lokayata daruwekwa genalla, ee daruwata thama gana balaganna bari kirisappayekwa inna kalaye kanna bonna dila wayasin wadiwanakan balaganna eken ee daruwa sadakalikawa thamata naya gaththek wenawa kiyala, karunakarala ehema aya me loketa daruwan bihi nokara inna.
wahana gaman pilibanda salakilimath wanna.
ewani awasthawak k rishna, arjun ha bhim b rahmanayan lesa jarasandha hamuwimata gos bhim samaga dwandha yuddhayakata aaradhana karanawa.
nithiya pilibanda samahara nyayacharyawaru pawasanne ‛wiplawaya wanahi winishchayata bandun kala nohaki deshapalana gataluwak’ bawa ya.
namuth ee nisama, eka wyapruthiyak wadunaya kiyala me wage giwisum gahanna bahayi kiya apata tharka karanna baha.batahira milatalokaye hama ratakma ada thama thamange kalapawala giwisum gahanawa.
eheth ape rate ewani panak natha.
palamu nidahas ulela samaruwe mehemayi.
mokada, mama thadinma wishwasa karanawa wadath wadagath nirmanaya misak nirmanakaruwa nemeyi kiyala.
hodayi api issarala me pitasakwala yana pilibada adahasak labaganimu.
bahu liyapadinchi wu siyalu denata ek lipinayak thora ganna lesa mathiwarna karyalaya wisin owunta danum dun athara ee anuwa siyalu bahu liyapadinchi wim iwath kirimata hakiwi thibe.
ee kiyanne ee kale indalama me adina purudda thibila thiyenawa.

meya galwimedi sponj eka thethkara eya muhuna matha thaba semen thada karana (panch) aakarayata sidu kirimen ho brash ekaka aadharayen blend wana aakarayata sidu kirimen ehi kramawath bawak dakiya hakiyi.

eeka thamayi maitha්ripalage nithiya! (304)  upadhidhari 2660kata pathwim (301)  rathnapura thapala ledaweyi ! (300)  nawa awurudu sanskruthika wadasatahana - jarmaniya (300)  champika, pot sitith dan shokda ? (300)  deshapalana wisandumak labanodunnahoth eya demala janathawata wenwayama sandaha anumathiya labadimak wanu atha (300)  maththala guwanthotupole wi heta iwath kere ! (299)  indiya saranagatha kandawuruwala siti thawath pirisak diwayinata! (298)  apage demala janathawata adhyapanaya thulin nagi sitiya hakiya! (296)  bhikshu winaya panatha gana bengamuwe himiyan mahanahimiwarunta kiyayi (295)  eekabaddha wadapiliwelak ! (288)  wakugadu jawarama pilibada pancha pudgala kamitu warthawa heta saukhya amathyawarayata ! (288)  sika wairasayata muhunadimata sudanam  amathya rajitha senarathna ! (285)  lankiya ka්ridakayin 16k ayi.pi.el. wendesiyata ! (285)  gamunu waidyawarayekugen miliyana 100 k illayi ! (281)  nawa aandukrama wyawasthawak sakas kala yuthuya!

manda yath apa methuwak gaman kala maga depasa randemin kalmaramin hun polis balamulu kisiyam aakarayaka wirodhatha kandayam mardanaya karannata koyi mohothaka ho sahasi lesa kriyathmaka wanu athayi yana iwak ma thula wu bawini.

kotas wissakin pamana samanwitha mema kathawe prathama digaharuma mese obage rasawindanayata pradhanaya karamin dewana kotasada itha ikmanin oba wetha labadimata porondu wemi.
